Experience.title: Career Break
Experience.description: • Improved my Spanish in language stays in Argentina, Chile, and Spain

Experience.title: Technical Consultant
description: • Developed cloud-based solutions for managing manuals and documentation implemented in nearly 100 client institutions
• Automated and streamlined migration tasks using Python and PowerShell, resulting in a 12-fold process acceleration
• Trained end-users and supported customers in 10 Institutions
• Developed a Power Automate-based tool for managing continuous process improvement (7 customer implementations)

Experience.title: Research Assistant
Experience.description: • Elaborated code documentation using Sphinx following Master Thesis to make the developed model available for further research

Experience.title: Internship R&D liquid flow sensors
description: • Developed scripts for collecting and visualizing sensor data using Python
• Performed stress tests on sensors and control measurements
• Investigated a new energy-saving measurement method for liquid flow sensors

description.projectinstitution: Federal Institute of Aquatic Science - Eawag
description.details: • Developed an agent-based model to assess political and organizational factors of technology adaptation by stakeholders in the wastewater sector
• Developed simulation scenarios including 8 million agents to assess the future demand of Electric Vehicle charging stations using Python

Education.title: BSc in Mechanical Engineering
